title: Hadrian raises funding for automated manufacturing, bringing valuation to $1.6B
description:
Hadrian plans to use the funding to accelerate factory expansion and advance the company's manufacturing roadmap.

The post Hadrian raises funding for automated manufacturing, bringing valuation to $1.6B appeared first on The Robot Report.
